title: Open Source Exchange and Ring Payment Gateway Services
body:
Xtremcoin, which integrates wearable technologies into the crypto money sector and exchange and payment systems, brings its works into our lives with rings, wristbands and glasses. Xtremcoin, which offers these technologies to us with NFC connection, allows the use of Xtremcoin in all of the fees. At the same time, it allocates the exchange platform free of charge to physical exchange offices in Turkey and around the world. Thus, it arranges each exchange office to have its own cryptocurrency platform.

No need to rediscover the world. NFC connected ring technology is used in many areas all over the world. Many companies also have their own exchange system. However, such an advanced technology is not included in any exchange infrastructure. The NFC system has a credit card-based connection. A technology we know as contactless payment. Xtremcoin is the first in this technology to integrate the crypto money system and connect the fee payments to a token study.
author: 0x1Ff4CBeAB4dE09B7a53d398cc773dC6ea2585Ab8
